verses.verse: Paul <S%G3972><s%>, a <S%G1401>servant<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1588>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G1588>elect<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> <S%G1588>of<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is according to <S%G2150>godliness<s%>,

but1161, 5319 in his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G2540>seasons<s%> <S%G5319>manifested<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2782>message<s%>, <S%G3739>wherewith<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> was <S%G4100>intrusted<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G2003>commandment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4990>Saviour<s%>;

to <S%G5103>Titus<s%>, my <S%G1103>true<s%> <S%G5043>child<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> a <S%G2839>common<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>: Grace5485, 1656 and <S%G1515>peace<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> and2532, 2962 <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4990>Saviour<s%>.

For <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G5484>cause<s%> left <S%G2641>I<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2914>Crete<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> thou shouldest set in <S%G1930>order<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> that were <S%G3007>wanting<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2525>appoint<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> in <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> gave <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G1299>charge<s%>;

if <S%G1487><s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G410>blameless<s%>, the <S%G435>husband<s%> of <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> that <S%G4103>believe<s%>, who are <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2724>accused<s%> of <S%G810>riot<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G506>unruly<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G1985>bishop<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G410>blameless<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G3623>steward<s%>; <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G829>self-willed<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> soon <S%G3711>angry<s%>, <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G3943>brawler<s%>, <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4131>striker<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> greedy of filthy <S%G146>lucre<s%>;
but <S%G235><s%> given to <S%G5382>hospitality<s%>, a lover of <S%G5358>good<s%>, <S%G4998>sober-minded<s%>, <S%G1342>just<s%>, <S%G3741>holy<s%>, <S%G1468>self-controlled<s%>;

holding <S%G472><s%> to the <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G2596>which<s%> is according to the <S%G1322>teaching<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> he may <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G1415>able<s%> <S%G2532>to<s%> <S%G3870>exhort<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5198>sound<s%> <S%G1319>doctrine<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G1651>convict<s%> the <S%G483>gainsayers<s%>.

This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3141>testimony<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G227>true<s%>. For which <S%G1223>cause<s%> <S%G1651>reprove<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G664>sharply<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> they may be <S%G5198>sound<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G156>faith<s%>,

not <S%G3361><s%> giving heed <S%G4337>to<s%> <S%G2451>Jewish<s%> <S%G3454>fables<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1785>commandments<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%> who turn away <S%G654>from<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%>.

To the <S%G2513>pure<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G2513>pure<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> to them that are <S%G3392>defiled<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G571>unbelieving<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> is <S%G2513>pure<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3563>mind<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> are <S%G3392>defiled<s%>.

They <S%G3670>profess<s%> that they <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> by their <S%G2041>works<s%> they <S%G720>deny<s%> <S%G5607>him<s%>, being <S%G947>abominable<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G545>disobedient<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G96>reprobate<s%>.
